backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing admin authentication, access control, user profiles, bookings, service rates, time slots, and image path configuration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module updating stored admin credentials while preserving other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, theme variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and global layout with header, footer, and toast provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin bookings table with sorting and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagesEdit: Admin interface for editing hero, service card, and gallery image path settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: UI form that loads current service rates, allows editing three numeric rate fields, and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Admin interface to toggle availability of predefined time slots and save the updated availability.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Wrapper that validates admin session, showing a loader or login form before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Login form for admin users with validation, error display, and authentication submission.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Customer booking form handling validation, prefills, time‑slot availability, submission, and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Validation utility that checks booking form fields for required values, formats, and logical date constraints.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Floating WhatsApp contact button that normalizes a phone number and links to a WhatsApp chat URL.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky call‑to‑action bar that triggers a booking action when tapped.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Live cost estimator that calculates or displays inspection messaging based on area, selected service, and service rates.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying company info, contact details, services list, and a powered-by attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the sticky site header with logo, account navigation, and call button using config phone number.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Displays contact info including phone, email, and service areas with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Shows a before/after gallery using provided or default images.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner with background image, headline, and buttons for booking or calling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Presents a three-step explanation of the service process with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Shows customer reviews with star ratings in card layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper supporting variants and reveal-on-scroll animation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Renders service cards with images, details, and booking buttons using service data.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Lists key reasons to choose the service with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Exports phone, WhatsApp, and email configuration values.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines service data and helper to compute service rates from backend values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Manages admin authentication state, login, logout, and session validation using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all bookings, fetch user-specific bookings, and create bookings with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePaths.ts: Fetches and updates website image paths with defaults and admin-authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Queries whether the current caller is an admin with minimal retry and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Implements an intersection observer hook to reveal elements when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: Fetches and updates service rates, providing defaults when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: Fetches and updates availability of time slots with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and saves the authenticated user's profile with proper query state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes, global styles, and mobile adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account page handling login, profile setup, profile management, and viewing user bookings.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing images, rates, time slots, and bookings behind admin auth.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component assembling marketing sections, image-driven content, and smooth-scroll booking behavior. It scrolls to the booking section when a preselected service exists.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Zustand store that manages a preselected booking service and provides setters and a clear function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, architecture notes, admin rules, and existing features for the Ceiling Pro booking site.
